titleStmt.title: Reformation of manners the true way of honouring God with the necessity of putting the laws in execution against vice and profaneness : in a sermon preached at White-hall / by the late Right Reverend Father in God, Edward, Lord Bishop of Worcester ; and published by Their Majesties special command.
titleStmt.author: Stillingfleet, Edward, 1635-1699.

notesStmt.note: "Not printed in any of the volumes of His Lordship's sermons."
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
